snippet: Prime Minister Erna Solberg says the number of immigrants had put “too much pressure” on Justice Minister Anders Anundsen.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Erna Solberg says the number of immigrants had put “too much pressure” on Justice Minister Anders Anundsen.

headline.main: Norway: New Ministry Is Created to Address Influx of Migrants
headline.print_headline: Norway: New Ministry Is Created to Address Influx of Migrants
